article_title: Mexico's Left May Be Divided Further by a New Political Party
article_text:
MEXICO CITY—Andrés Manuel López Obrador, Mexico's best-known leftist leader and an unsuccessful presidential candidate, is getting close to registering a new political party that could further fragment a divided left ahead of midterm elections.

Electoral authorities are expected to confirm in the coming weeks that Mr. López Obrador's new party, called Movimiento Regeneración Nacional, or Morena, fulfills the requirements to register. Registration will allow the party to run candidates in 2015 midterm elections, and opens...
